concept.title: HelioNote REST API Overview
concept.shortdesc: The HelioNote REST API enables developers to integrate note-taking features into their own applications. It provides endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes.

section.title: What is HelioNote?
section.p: HelioNote is a fictional cloud-based note-taking service that allows users to create, organize, and share notes across devices.

section.title: Why Use the API?
section.p: The API allows developers to extend HelioNoteâ€™s functionality by embedding note management into their own apps or workflows.

section.title: Who Should Use This API?
section.p: The HelioNote API is designed for developers building integrations, custom applications, or automations that require note management.
